statements: DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND activity_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE activity_details->>'location' = 'New York';
DELETE FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND email = 'john.doe@example.com')
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 123 AND recommendation_type = 'new',
DELETE FROM users WHERE age < 18 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week')
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%')
DELETE FROM Users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND TIMESTAMP > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH;
DELETE FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'movie' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND activity_type = 'login';
